column2: Table 6#4C# Full-Time and Part-Time Employees by Industry
1. Beginning with 1990, reflects the reclassification of employees of Indian tribal
governments from the private sector to state and local government.
2. Reflects the reclassification of air couriers from trucking and warehousing to
3. Consists of museums, botanical and zoological gardens; engineering and management
services; and services, not elsewhere classified.
5. Beginning with 1993, includes estimates of foreign professional workers and
undocumented Mexican migratory workers employed temporarily in the United States.
Note.  Estimates in this table are based on the 1987 Standard Industrial Classification (SIC).
